Supported Java and Gradle versionsÂ¶

Java
JDK 8+ is required. We daily integrate with Java LTS versions, currently Java 8 and Java 11 are supported.
Gradle
We guarantee backward-compatibility with the latest 3 major Gradle versions, and we provide best effort compatibility with prior versions. We daily integrate with the following Gradle distributions:
Gradle Java Integration Compatibility
latest version 8/11 OK Guaranteed as soon as possible
5.0 8 OK Guaranteed
4.10.3 8 OK Guaranteed
4.0 8 OK Guaranteed
3.5 8 OK Guaranteed
3.0 8 OK Guaranteed
2.14.1 8 OK Best effort, might break in the future
2.0 8 OK Best effort, might break in the future
1.12 8 OK Best effort, might break in the future
